text: (Aey paighambar) yeh Allah ki badi rehmat hai ke tum in logon ke liye bahut narm mijaz waqey huye ho, warna agar kahin tum tundh-khu (rough) aur sangh dil hotey to yeh sab tumhare gird o pesh se chath jatey. Inke kasoor maaf kardo, inke haqq mein dua-e-magfirat karo, aur deen ke kaam mein inko bhi shareek e mashwara rakkho. Phir jab tumhara azam (resolve) kisi rai par mustahkam ho jaye to Allah par bharosa karo, Allah ko woh log pasand hain jo usi ke bharose par kaam karte hain
